summary: All requested features tested and verified working: Admin Add Category from Products page, Admin Packs management at /admin/packs, Order Delivered status, Cart persistence after navigation/refresh

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed
Console warning: Button nested inside button in AccordionTrigger - minor HTML structure issue

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (POST /api/auth/login) - 200 OK
Backend: Admin GET categories - returns all categories
Backend: Admin POST category creation - new category created and persisted
Backend: Admin GET packs - returns all packs with variants and items
Backend: Admin POST pack creation - new pack created
Backend: Admin POST variant to pack - variant added with items
Backend: Admin PATCH order status to 'delivered' - status updated and persisted
Backend: 15/15 pytest tests passed
Frontend: Homepage loads correctly with products and categories
Frontend: Admin login flow working
Frontend: Admin Products page - Add Category button opens dialog
Frontend: Admin Products page - Category creation shows success message
Frontend: Admin Products page - New category appears in category badges
Frontend: Admin Packs page at /admin/packs loads with existing packs
Frontend: Admin Packs page - Add Pack dialog opens
Frontend: Admin Order Detail - Status dropdown shows all statuses including 'Delivered'
Frontend: Admin Order Detail - Status change shows success message
Frontend: Cart persistence - items persist after page navigation
Frontend: Cart persistence - items persist after page refresh
Frontend: Cart badge shows correct item count
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_UICategory category during UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working as expected. Cart persistence fix using useRef to skip initial mount is working correctly. Admin features (category, packs, delivered status) all functional. Order #1 is currently in 'delivered' status, Order #2 was tested with status change to 'delivered'. Test data (TEST_ prefixed categories and packs) has been cleaned up.

add_category_from_products_page.notes: Add Category button opens dialog, category name can be entered, creation shows success message, new category appears in badge list

admin_packs_page.notes: Page at /admin/packs loads correctly, shows existing packs (Starter, Family, Premium), Add Pack button opens creation dialog

order_delivered_status.notes: Status dropdown in order detail includes 'Delivered' option, status change persists and shows success message

cart_persistence.notes: Cart items persist after page navigation and page refresh. Using localStorage with useRef to prevent race conditions on initial mount
